p: The concentration of α-bisabolol (monocyclic sesquiterpenoid) was 0.4 to 2.9% in the EO of wild hemp, n.d to 6.9% in the registered cultivars, and 0.5 to 3.5% in the EO of the breeding lines ( Supplementary Tables S1–S3). α-Bisabolol was statistically the highest in the EO of cv. CS and lower in wild hemp and cvs. Bacalmas, Sequieni, and Spic ( Table 2). α-Bisabolol in the USA strain EO was 3.0 to 4.4%. Epi-α-bisabolol was reported in the EO of spontaneous hemp from Hungary [ 18].
